Sure, here is an updated action plan that takes into account the fact that the student is taking a full load of credits for the fall and spring semesters:

First Three Months (Fall Semester)
----------------------------------

* Apply to at least 10 internships per week in the field of interest and tailor the resume and cover letter accordingly.
* Attend at least one public speaking workshop/seminar and practice delivering speeches in front of small audiences.
* Attend at least two networking events and aim to make at least one meaningful connection at each event.
* Join a student organization and get involved in planning at least one event.

Second Three Months (Fall Semester)
-----------------------------------

* Follow up with the internships that have been applied to and prepare well for the interviews.
* Attend at least one public speaking workshop/seminar and deliver a presentation in front of a small audience.
* Attend at least two networking events and aim to make at least one meaningful connection at each event.
* Take up a leadership role in the student organization and plan an event successfully.

Third Three Months (Spring Semester)
------------------------------------

* Secure an internship with a major company and start working on building a professional network within the company.
* Deliver a presentation to an audience of at least 25 people with confidence and clarity.
* Attend at least two networking events and aim to make at least one meaningful connection at each event.
* Continue taking up leadership roles in the student organization and work towards planning another successful event.

Fourth Three Months (Spring Semester)
-------------------------------------

* Continue working on the internship and gaining experience in the field of interest.
* Attend at least one public speaking workshop/seminar and deliver a presentation in front of a larger audience.
* Attend at least two networking events and aim to make at least one meaningful connection at each event.
* Collaborate with the student organization to plan a major event and lead a successful execution.

In this updated plan, the action plan is aligned with the academic schedule, with the first three months being the fall semester and the second three months being the spring semester. The student will work on achieving their goals while taking a full load of credits during each semester. The plan is still broken down into four segments with specific actions to be taken in each segment, but the timeline is adjusted to fit within the fall and spring semesters.
